metadata.purpose: Complete system of truth for validation runner reference

changes: Added comprehensive UI elements taxonomy captured via Playwright browser automation

Added Employee Profile page structure under Company > All Employees with all 12 tabs: About Me, Work, Documents, Dependents, Leaves, Health Insurance, Payroll, Attendance, Timesheet, Assets, Air tickets, Performance

tables.description: Data tables with rows and columns

clickable_links.description: Underlined text that navigates to detail pages

examples: New adjustment (New addition, New deduction, New recurring)

content.visibility: hidden when collapsed, shown when expanded

nested_accordion.description: Accordions containing other accordions or tables
examples: Settings > Payroll > Leave encashment policy (has table inside)

badges_and_tags.description: Small labels indicating status or category

count_badge.location: next to menu item or tab

feature_badge.location: next to feature name in navigation

cards.description: Contained content blocks with optional actions

examples: Assigned to me/Created by me tabs

view_all_link.styling: text link with optional arrow icon

progress_indicators.description: Visual indicators of progress or completion

filter_chips.description: Applied filters shown as removable chips

employee_profile_page.access: Click on employee name from All Employees list

elements.heading: Manage leaves
elements.description: Different types of leave employee can take

switches: Automatically generate payslips at the end of the month
Allow employees to download their payslips
Allow employees to edit payment details of their Bank/Exchange House

cards.title: Employee Custom Data
cards.description: Create and manage all employee related custom data.

cards.title: Company Custom Data
cards.description: Create and manage all company related custom data.

cards.title: Asset Custom Data
cards.description: Create and manage all asset related custom data.

elements.heading: Email notifications
elements.note: Please note that you will still continue to receive emails regarding critical actions on Bayzat.

password_settings.description: Change the password for your Bayzat account.

mfa_settings.description: Add an additional layer of security for your Bayzat app by enabling multi-factor authentication for your account.

validation_notes.loan_requests_context: Requests > Loans shows Payroll submenu context in sidebar
